text: Luaty Beirão (born 1981) is an Angolan rapper known for his anti-corruption activism. Beirão was born to a Portuguese Angolan family in Luanda and his father was a well-known member of the MPLA. He continues to write and create music. In March 2016, he was sentenced to five and a half years in prison for allegedly planning a revolution against president José Eduardo dos Santos. == References == Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:Angolan hip hop musicians Category:Angolan musicians Category:People from Luanda Category:Angolan people of Portuguese descent
title: Luaty Beirão
